Text: A number of Rome fans have started an online petition to be sent to HBO for a 3rd season of Rome. http://www.petitiononline.com/rome_hbo/petition.html
It works with RealPlayer, but is a little "chunky", but for me the worst was that it is with Chinese text!

Any Video Convertor converts RMVB files to avi, mpeg2, and other managable file types.  And Best of all it's free, and clean[free of adware/spyware].

Just thought that I'd share the info and maybe save someone a headache. {I purchased a converting program that cost over $80 to convert a batch of RMBV vids, only to learn that the prog that didn't even recognize RMBV files}
Is there any way to remove the chinese text?
